meaningMnemonic: <radical>Crab</radical>s in the <radical>dirt</radical> make a great <kanji>foundation</kanji> for a seaside hut. It's right on the seashore, where all the crabs dig their holes in the dirt. But as they get old and die, their bodies form a strong base. Perfect for the foundation of a building like this!
readingMnemonic: Remember, a good <kanji>foundation</kanji> is the <reading>key</reading> (き) to a good house. No, literally. You have to use a piece of the foundation to make the key to your house.
